Tutorial.Subject: Bank Issue
Tutorial.MainBody:
There has beeen an issue with your bankk, please send me your bank accounttt ddetails so I can deal with it.
This is not a phishing email.

Encounter1.Subject: Game Subscription Payment
Encounter1.MainBody: I reqquire your payment to your weekly game subscription. Reply to this email with your full name and address.
Encounter1.End:
Please send it as soon as possible.
John doe

Encounter2.Subject: Extra Maths Session
Encounter2.MainBody:
I would like to set up an extra math session for this weekend.
Let me know what you think.

Encounter3.Subject: URGENT! You Win BIG Price!!!
Encounter3.MainBody: You have winned a BIG PRICE! Claim now or lose foreever.
Encounter3.End: Send us ur full name and birth day NOW to collect.

Encounter4.Subject: Pls Send Your Homework Now!
Encounter4.MainBody: we need all students to send their homework to us so we can check it.
Encounter4.End: Even if teacher not say so, do it now.

Encounter5.Subject: Your School Account Update Required
Encounter5.MainBody: We are updating our system and need you to confirm your school login. Please use the secure link below.
Encounter5.End: If you do not verify, your account may be locked.

Encounter6.Subject: Important Notice from Principal
Encounter6.MainBody: You have been selected for a special school program! Please reply with your full name and student ID to confirm your spot.

Encounter7.Subject: Reminder: School Trip Permission Slip Due
Encounter7.MainBody: Just a reminder that the permission slips for the upcoming school trip are due by Friday. Please submit them to the office or bring them to class.
Encounter7.End: Let me know if you have any questions!

Encounter8.Subject: Mysterious Gift for You!
Encounter8.MainBody: Someone sent you a surprise gift! But we can't deliver it without your confirmation.
Encounter8.End: Click below to claim your gift before it expires!

Encounter9.Subject: Hey, quick favor?
Encounter9.MainBody: I need your help real quick. My phone is broken, and I can't log in to my account. Can you send me your login details so I can check something? Just use this quick helper link below to send it securely.

Encounter10.Subject: Important: Your Account Has Been Suspended!
Encounter10.MainBody: Your account has been temporarily suspended due to suspicious activity. To regain access, please verify your details immediately.
Encounter10.End: Failure to do so may result in permanent deactivation.
